articles.title: "No Consular Access Request": India On US Murder-For-Hire Plot Case - NDTV
articles.description: The government has said it has not received any consular access request from Nikhil Gupta, an Indian accused of being involved in a murder-for-hire plot against a Khalistani terrorist on American soil. "
articles.content:
Nikhil Gupta was extradited to the US on June 14.
New Delhi: The government today said it has not received any consular access request from Nikhil Gupta, an Indian accused of being involved in a mur… [+1512 chars]

articles.title: Kevin Costner Confirms He Will Not Be Returning to ‘Yellowstone’: “I Just Realized That I’m Not Going to Be Able to Continue” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The actor posted a message to social media saying that he is focused on his epic Western movie series 'Horizon: An American Saga.'
articles.content:
It’s official: Kevin Costner will not be returning to Yellowstone.
